RegainYourHealth: Regain your health and mobility. Leave your pain behind. Do the things you love. Our team of health professionals is dedicated to providing you with the best medical solutions for your injury or condition. Our specialists collaborate to find pain treatments

firstAboutParagraph: This Hospital is a corporate entity operating in the healthcare field aiming to lead the private health care sectors in Egypt, MENA Region, East Europe, and East Asia into new frontiers building on Alameda’s vast experience and reputation
secondAboutParagraph: This Hospital is a network that has various healthcare subsidiaries all over Egypt which also include affiliation with Royal free hospital in London, outpatient clinics, diagnostic centers, specialist centers, pharmacies, International Relations Department to support all our expats’ medical needs (including facilitating their visa application, bookings at contracted hotels and concierge services), and video conferencing with our eminent consultants 24/7 through our Tele-medicine service and the German Rehabilitation Center.
provideAppointments: We provide you with reservations so that every patient enters his appointment.
emergency: The emergency unit operates 24 hours a day and is staffed by highly qualified doctors.
urgentcare: Our urgent care centers provide rapid-access to the care you deserve immediately.
Trust: Your Trust is Our Greatest Incentive!

medical: Positioning Egypt as a One Country Brand showcasing its exceptional medical, wellness, hospitality and concierge services globally.
wellness: Enhancing patients’ experience through integrating medical, wellness, hospitality and concierge services by using technology.
